name: Railway Outlaws
description:
Escape the law in this thrilling competitive 1v1 strategy game! Run, Shoot and jump from one train to another while you escape the law in a classic western-inspired chase sequence in an attempt to break free from the law, but beware the other outlaws, they might attempt to sabotage your ride!

(TanforDev) Jose Arturo Mendez and Adrian Rangel Suarez - Programmers
Diego Lozano Garza - Game Art and assets
Andres Vera Cervantes - Graphic Designer and UI artist
Andres Patricio Montoya Garza - Music Composition and SFX
